article: australian and philippine officials agreed that al-qaida 's alleged asian ally , jemaah islamiyah , remains the biggest terrorist threat in the region and pledged wednesday to cooperate closer to eradicate the group .
abstract: australia philippines say jemaah islamiyah remains biggest regional terror threat
